title: Where is sixth sense technology used? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have never known if such a technology ever existed! What is termed as a ‘sixth sense’ is nothing but a ‘guesstimate’ based on one’s past experiences and one’s ability to extrapolate possible outcomes in a given situation. It might so happen, coincidentally, that sometimes such a wild guess matches with actual happening in due course of time. But, that is just a coincidence. Life and nature is full of such coincidences.
